item.description: So, I have been involved with an organization that has done this Book & Brew type event in the past and it was fun. It's basically a social event that includes reading a book and getting together once a month (at a pub/restaurant) to discuss the book, while having some beer and grabbing a bite. I have started a discussion to get some feed back as to what book people might want to read, and to know what people thought about the timing. It looks like the book is The Evolution of God by Robert Wright. I will have loaner copies of the book, if you need one please email me. This Book & Brew meet-up, which I hope to offer once a month, is aimed at sharing, good, scientific literature, philosophical literature, inspiring stories, and the occasional piece of fiction. I will post more information as I get more feed back. This will most likely be held somewhere near Government Center, for convenience.
item.how_to_find_us: There will be a table reserved for BA..
item.name: Book & Brew (The Evolution of God by Robert Wright)
